{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Yujing Terrace|It|Yujing Terrace}} is the westernmost part of the city and its wealthiest residential district. It is built along the cliffside of [[Mt. Tianheng]], overlooking the Harbor. The entrance to the district is located at the north, where a crossroads links Yujing Terrace, [[Feiyun Slope]], the small island that [[Bubu Pharmacy]] stands on and the road exiting the city that leads toward the [[Guizhong Ballista]].</p>}}
